member.name: M:MT264.AverageFinder.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Preconditions: none Postconditions: An AverageFinder object has been created with no numbers yet recorded.
member.remarks: Invokes reset() as this does the right things.

member.name: M:MT264.AverageFinder.getCount
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: Returns how many numbers have been recorded.

member.name: M:MT264.AverageFinder.getAverage
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If no numbers have been recorded, "" is returned, otherwise the average of the recorded numbers, as a string, is returned.
member.returns: String representation of average (or empty string)
member.remarks: Could return a more informative message when fCount is zero.

member.name: M:MT264.AverageFinder.addNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If aNumber is a valid representation of a number then the corresponding number is recorded; else nothing is done.
member.param: The parameter aNumber should be the string representation of a number to add to the total.
member.remarks: Converts aNumber to a double, if possible. Silently ignores non-numeric strings.

member.name: M:MT264.AverageFinder.reset
member.summary: Precondition: none Postcondition: The object has been put back in its original state with no numbers recorded.
member.remarks: This method resets the state of the object and so allows it to be used for finding a number of different averages. It is used by the New() constructor because it does the right thing for that too.

member.name: T:MT264.AverageFinder
member.summary: This class implements the AverageFinder specified in Block 1, Unit 2.

member.name: P:MT264.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MT264.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:MT264.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:MT264.CharCounter.countChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The number of upper- and lower-case occurrences of the letter aChar in the current string is returned.
member.returns: The number of upper- and lower-case occurrences of the letter aChar in the current string.

member.name: M:MT264.CharCounter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Preconditions: none Postconditions: new instance of CharCounter is created in which the current string is set to the empty string.

member.name: T:MT264.CharCounter
member.summary: This class implements CharCounter as specified in Block 1 Unit 3.

member.name: M:MT264.TrafficSurvey.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor A new instance of TrafficSurvey is created with both vehicle counts set to zero.

member.name: M:MT264.TrafficSurvey.addCar
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The number of cars recorded is incremented by one.

member.name: M:MT264.TrafficSurvey.addBicycle
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The number of bicycless recorded is incremented by one.

member.name: M:MT264.TrafficSurvey.getCars
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: an integer whose value is the number of cars recorded is returned.

member.name: M:MT264.TrafficSurvey.getBicycles
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: an integer whose value is the number of bicycles recorded is returned.

member.name: T:MT264.TrafficSurvey
member.summary: This class implements TrafficSurvey as specified in Block 1 Unit 2

member.name: T:MT264.BirdStatus
member.summary: Enumerated type with three values.

member.name: P:MT264.Bird.Activity
member.summary: Set Preconditions: The three image files exist and are valid image files. Postconditions: The bird's activity for the setter is changed to that given by the parameter value. The current picture is set to that corresponding to the activity.

member.name: M:MT264.Bird.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Preconditions: The image file "Standing.jpg" exists and is a valid image file. Postconditions: A Bird object that is standing has been created. The current picture is that of a standing bird.
member.remarks: The property is used even though this is the constructor as it ensures all the correct processing has been done.

member.name: M:MT264.Bird.Dispose
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The resources used by fCurrentPicture have been released.

member.name: T:MT264.Bird
member.summary: This class implements the Bird specified in Block 1 Unit 3.

member.name: F:MT264.GuessNumber.fChosen
member.summary: The value of fChosen is the current number to be guessed.

member.name: F:MT264.GuessNumber.fRandom
member.summary: fRandom provides a pseudo-random number generator.

member.name: M:MT264.GuessNumber.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Preconditions: none Postconditions: A GuessNumber object is created with the chosen number set to a random integer between 1 and 10.

member.name: M:MT264.GuessNumber.chooseNumber
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The chosen number is set to a random integer between 1 and 10.

member.name: M:MT264.GuessNumber.isGuessCorrect(System.Int32)
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If guess equals the chosen number, True is returned; otherwise False is returned.

member.name: M:MT264.GuessNumber.getNumber
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The value of the chosen number is returned.
